name: llm-cli-council
description: Get diverse AI perspectives on implementation plans and code reviews by orchestrating multiple LLM CLIs (Claude, Copilot, Codex, Gemini, Ollama) through a council approach

skills.name: llm-cli-council
skills.description: Main orchestration skill for multi-LLM council

skills.name: llm-cli-council:setup
skills.description: Detect and configure available LLM CLIs

skills.name: llm-cli-council:status
skills.description: Show council configuration and provider status

skills.name: llm-cli-council:review-plan
skills.description: Get council review of implementation plans

skills.name: llm-cli-council:review-code
skills.description: Get council review of code changes
